articles.author: Adele Ankers-Range
articles.title: Loki Season 2 Post-Credits Scene Piques Curiosity as Fans Spot Thor Easter Egg - IGN
articles.description: The first episode of Loki Season 2 has a post-credits scene, which you definitely won't want to miss as it has become an instant talking point amongst fans who noticed an interesting little nod to the Thor comics.
articles.content:
Warning: This article contains full spoilers for Loki's Season 2 premiere, which is now streaming on Disney+.
